short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that shows other party members on the same page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want to see how many others are online on the same site. Use this extension to always be aware of other party members partying on the same site as you are.
